title: Welcome to Tauri
text_blocks: Tauri lets you build native apps using web technologies.
It is lightweight and performant.
You can use Rust for the backend.

title: Why Choose Tauri?
text_blocks: Tauri is secure and fast.
It has a small bundle size compared to Electron.
You can integrate it with React, Vue, or Svelte.
